xwikidoc.content:
Magic items unique to Erithnoi.
== Artifacts ==
* [[Balzak's Axe>>AxeOfBalzak]] - The legendary weapon of an ancient dwarven hero. * [[Shield of Kinnis>>TheShieldofKinnis]] - This legendary artifact is the ancient symbol of the kings of Kinergh.
